!Asamah: The sacred ax known as Gazkh was originally bestowed upon the ancient Elkrokhian warriors by Shilen. It had the power to seal dinosaurs in their prison to preserve the safety of the island. When it was broken, we think there was a backlash of negative energy. [Quest _126_IntheNameofEvilPart2 asama_q0126_09.htm|"What negative energy?"]
